title: Client Vibrates Then Crashes
body:
I've been getting an odd glitch regarding the League Client. It will spontaneously start vibrating, for lack of a better word. The window itself will jump slightly from left to right at high speeds, during which I cannot click anything on the client. It usually crashes after around 10 seconds of this.

Are there any known fixes?

replies.body:
> #Beta Client

Click the cog to the top right corner of the client then click "Initiate Full Repair".

> #Legacy Client

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

Let us know the results.
